/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warmth of a sunny day. The sky, a canvas of blue, is lightly brushed with wisps of white clouds. The sun, a radiant orb, shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene below.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Two cars, one white and one black, are in motion, their colors contrasting against the gray of the road. They are driving on the right side of the road, adhering to the rules of the road.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades a mix of architectural styles. Some are modern, their glass and steel structures reflecting the sunlight, while others are older, their brick and concrete facades adding a touch of history to the scene.

The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green. They provide a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls.

Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and harmony. Each element, from the moving cars to the towering buildings, the verdant trees, and the silent streetlights, coexists in this snapshot of city life. It's a moment frozen in time, a glimpse into a day in the life of a city.
